game.name: Slimestoppers
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Slimestoppers is a top down horde shooter that pits the technology of man against a relentless army of sentient slimes from space. Choose from an ever-expanding arsenal of weapons, abilities, perks, and equipment to forge the perfect Slimestopper. Supports multiplayer up to 4 players!
